channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ambassador Kimberly Guilfoyle, the Talk of Athens
item.description: The former fiancée of Donald Trump Jr., and the former wife of Gov. Gavin Newsom, is working hard and pushing deals with American business interests. ...

item.title: Countries must move beyond seeing AI as a race, where one side must beat the other
item.description: When it comes to AI, cooperation between countries can yield greater benefits than working alone.

item.title: Trump snatches Maduro but leaves his regime in charge for now
item.description: For now, there’s no plan spelled out to have American troops or administrators in Venezuela.

item.title: This Is What Venezuelans Really Want
item.description: We have long faced a brutal paradox: an absent yet omnipotent state.

item.title: Inside Mamdani’s Decision to Revoke Executive Orders That Backed Israel
item.description: Mr. Mamdani, a staunch critic of Israel and its treatment of Palestinians, knew he would not extend the orders, but he had to decide how and when he w...

item.title: Deploying U.S. troops in Venezuela could become a ‘force protection nightmare’ amid potential insurgency threat, retired colonel warns
item.description: "The risk with Venezuela is that it could be a hostile environment as well, and that could put U.S. forces in great danger."

item.title: Heavy Rain and King Tides Cause Flooding in California
item.description: Highways were blocked and a regional airport shut down on Saturday when the latest in a long run of drenching rainstorms coincided with especially hig...

item.title: Ukrainian Politics Has Reawakened. Zelensky Must Tread Carefully.
item.description: The Ukrainian leader is reshuffling his cabinet as a corruption scandal reshapes the political landscape at a pivotal point in peace negotiations.

item.title: Before Maduro arrest, Nobel Prize winner said Venezuela has a $1.7 trillion opportunity to privatize over 500 companies and undo socialist ‘disaster’

item.title: Ukrainian Politics Has Reawakened. Zelensky Must Tread Carefully.
item.description: The Ukrainian leader is reshuffling his cabinet as a corruption scandal reshapes the political landscape at a pivotal point in peace negotiations.

item.title: The Bat Woman of North London: ‘It’s Like Tuning In to Another World’
item.description: On night walks through Highgate Wood, Cindy Blaney shares the whirling wonder of the often-maligned mammals with the humans below.

item.title: Trump seeks to make Venezuela great again and revive its oil-based economy while affordability crisis lingers in the U.S.
item.description: "We have tremendous energy in that country. It's very important that we protect it. We need that for ourselves."
